summary: The chat history outlines development and testing efforts for a 'bchat' system, focusing on Claude Code integration, a comprehensive session involving workspace cleanup, multi-provider API integration, Claude Sonnet 4 configuration, and production deployment readiness, along with specific trigger testing.

sections.title: Key Achievements
items: Decision to proceed with workspace cleanup for the bchat system.
Decision to implement multi-provider API integration.
Decision to configure Claude Sonnet 4 for the bchat system.
Decision to prepare the bchat system for production deployment.
